name: Screen of Death
description:
Looks like you found your old handheld! It even has some of your old games around! You should totally play some of those.

Oh...that's unfortunate. Looks like it's on its last legs. Your screen is failing. Well, you should still play as much as you can before you can't see what's going on. 

Here's a list of the games you can choose from:

Party Snek: A classic. Run around get food before you run into the wall (or yourself). 

Just a Hedgehog 2: Not as good as the original, but still okay. You run around and shoot ghosts. Pretty straightforward.

It's Bomb Time: The robot towers shoot at you and you have to avoid their bullets. Use your bombs to protect yourself and temporarily knock them out of commission. I don't remember those white bombs. Maybe you should try those where your screen is failing.

Slime Stomp: This is a take on a whack-a-mole game. Hit the slimes before they escape. Let too many get away and you lose!

Credits: I'm not sure what this is. Weird. Definitely check it out.

Title Screen: Another weird looking one. You should start with that one.

Controls:

Arrow keys: Push the d-Pad

Space bar/enter: Push the A button
